addr: 216 S Alameda St Los Angeles, CA 90012
title: Ale Academy XVIII: Beer, Cheese & Chocolate Pairing
desc: This month's Ale Academy will feature guest speaker Alex Ourieff, Cheesemonger from?Vagabond Cheese, who will be curating some special cheese and chocolate selections?paired together with special Angel City beers. ?We'll examine the different ways beer pairs with these products and helps amplify or contrast the unique flavors, making the whole sum greater than each of its parts. ? Your $40 ticket includes the tasting & discussion of 5 different cheese, chocolate & beer pairings.
